item.title: PI help rep++
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

i have this:

public void ice(int i) { NPCHandler.npcs[i].requestTransform(9463); }
in my npchandler.java
i want to make it so it does that when i click on a certain npc, how could i make it do that?

Read full topic
